Como disse, n√£o √© que n√£o tenha sentimento, porque tenho.
N√£o √© porque n√£o goste de ti, porque gosto, e n√£o √© pouco.
N√£o √© porque n√£o tenha amor por ti, porque tenho e tamb√©m n√£o √© pouco.
√âs uma pessoa com um cora√ß√£o ‚ô•Ô∏è enorme, doce, torr√£ozinho, mas que n√£o deseja mal a ningu√©m. E isso √© aut√™ntico e maravilhoso.

Eu sei que me amas e eu tamb√©m. Mas amar s√≥ n√£o chega. Como disse, estas 2 semanas que deveriam ter sido maravilhosas n√£o foram (e n√£o estou a apontar dedos). E tamb√©m houve muitas vezes em que senti comoüí© .
trans:
üò¢
I felt we should have an honest conversation in which we could open üîìour heads and hearts.
As I said, it's not that I don't have feelings cause I do.
It's not that I don't like you because I do, and not just a little.
It's not because I don't love because I do and very much.
You are a person with an enormous, sweet and warm ‚ô•Ô∏è heart but who doesn't mean to hurt anyone. And this is so awesome and authentic.
I just looked for what I felt for you, that we're not aligned with each other, and that this caused me pain and discomfort, to me and to you, and that I wouldn't want to risk and continue with an uncomfortable situation for both of us.
As I said yesterday, I don't want to wear off and get to a situation in which instead of love, we start hating each other, because of the fights and the stress which unfortunately sometimes seems unending.
I know that you love me and that I do too. But love is not enough. As I said, these two weeks were supposed to be wonderful and they weren't (and I'm not pointing fingers). And there were also many times in which I felt like üí©.
